content.description: A student is investigating the motion of a coffee filter as it falls to the ground through the air. A graph of the velocity <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> of the coffee filter as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> is shown in the figure. Which of the following describes the changes in the magnitude of the acceleration and magnitude of resistive force of the coffee filter as it falls?
content.question: AccelerationResistive ForceADecreasingDecreasingBDecreasingIncreasingCIncreasingDecreasingDIncreasingIncreasing

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
